abstract: Fabian Boesch becomes the first men’s freestyle world champion from Switzerland by winning the slopestyle title in Kreischberg, Austria; other skiing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Boesch became the first men’s freestyle world champion from Switzerland by winning the slopestyle title on Wednesday in Kreischberg, Austria.
snippet: Boesch became the first men’s freestyle world champion from Switzerland by winning the slopestyle title on Wednesday in Kreischberg, Austria.

headline.main: Fabian Boesch Takes Men’s Slopestyle Title
